001package com.telos.loops.contacts;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
004import java.util.Map;
005
006/**
007 * Request to update an existing contact in Loops.
008 *
009 * <p>You must provide either an email or userId to identify the contact. Only the fields you
010 * provide will be updated; omitted fields remain unchanged. Custom properties can be updated via
011 * the additionalProperties map.
012 *
013 * <p>Example usage:
014 *
015 * <pre>{@code
016 * ContactUpdateRequest request = new ContactUpdateRequest(
017 *     "user@example.com",  // email (identifier)
018 *     "Jane",              // firstName (update)
019 *     null,                // lastName (no change)
020 *     null,                // subscribed (no change)
021 *     "enterprise",        // userGroup (update)
022 *     null,                // userId
023 *     null,                // mailingLists (no change)
024 *     Map.of("planName", "Enterprise")  // additionalProperties (update)
025 * );
026 * }</pre>
027 *
028 * @param email the email address of the contact to update (used as identifier or to update email)
029 * @param firstName the contact's first name (null to leave unchanged)
030 * @param lastName the contact's last name (null to leave unchanged)
031 * @param subscribed whether the contact should be subscribed (null to leave unchanged)
032 * @param userGroup the user group to assign (null to leave unchanged)
033 * @param userId your application's unique identifier (used as identifier or to update userId)
034 * @param mailingLists map of mailing list IDs to subscription status (null to leave unchanged)
035 * @param additionalProperties custom contact properties to update (null to leave unchanged)
036 */
037@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = false)
038public record ContactUpdateRequest(
039    String email,
040    String firstName,
041    String lastName,
042    Boolean subscribed,
043    String userGroup,
044    String userId,
045    Map<String, Boolean> mailingLists,
046    Map<String, Object> additionalProperties) {}
